TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LogExtentCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IO.Log.LogExtent>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class LogExtentCollection Implements IEnumerable(Of LogExtent)

summary.span: 表示與 關聯的 物件集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of objects associated with a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別包含與 關聯的 物件集合。This class contains a collection of objects associated with a . 執行個體會將它的資料儲存在 執行個體所代表的延伸磁碟區集合中。A instance stores its data in a collection of disk extents, represented by instances. 特定 只會與一個 相關聯，而且在同一個 中的 物件的大小都相同。A particular is associated with one , and objects in the same are of identical size. 在 執行個體中新增及移除空間時，將會以延伸區的倍數來進行。Space is added to and removed from a instance in extent increments. 雖然 物件會在磁碟上以檔案形式表示，但是您不可以將它們當做一般的檔案來移動或刪除。Although objects are represented on disk as files, they should not be moved or deleted as normal files. 您應該改用此類別所提供的方法來直接新增及刪除 執行個體。Rather, you should use the methods provided by this class for adding and deleting instances directly. 當延伸區不再包含任何使用中的資料時，通常會將延伸區移除。Extents are usually removed when they no longer contain any active data. 不過，如果 `force` 方法中的 參數為 `true`，當無法立即移除延伸區時就會擲回例外狀況。However, if the `force` parameter in the method is `true`, an exception is thrown if they cannot be removed immediately. 中的最後一個延伸區無法移除，意指 屬性在加入延伸區之後不可以為零。You cannot remove the last extent in the , which means that the property cannot be zero after an extent is added. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用 和 類別，在記錄順序中新增及模擬延伸區。This example shows how to use the and classes to add and emulate extents in a log sequence. [!code-csharp[S_UELogRecordSequence#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelogrecordsequence/cs/mylogrecordsequence.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UELogRecordSequence#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelogrecordsequence/vb/mylogrecordsequence.vb#0)]

summary.span: 將 執行個體新增至集合。

span.span: Adds a instance to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新加入的 執行個體大小與集合中現有的 執行個體大小相同。The size of the newly added instance is the same as the size of existing instances in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 請勿使用此方法將第一個 新增至集合。Do not use this method to add the first to the collection. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何使用 和 類別，在記錄順序中新增及模擬延伸區。This example shows how to use the and classes to add and emulate extents in a log sequence. summary.span: 建立指定大小的新 ，並將其加入至集合。

span.span: Creates a new with the specified size and adds it to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合不是空的，則指定大小必須至少要與集合中其他延伸區的大小相同。If the collection is not empty, the specified size must be at least as large as the size of the other extents in the collection. 在此情況下，會忽略 `size` 參數，並建立大小與集合中其他延伸區相同的延伸區。In this case, the `size` parameter is ignored, and the extent is created with the same size as the other extents in the collection.

Docs.exception:
因為下列其中一個原因而導致作業無效：
The operation is invalid for one of the following reasons:
- 列舉已經結束。The enumeration has ended.
- 集合已經過修改。The collection has been modified.
- 列舉尚未啟動。The enumeration has not been started.必須呼叫 。A call to must be made.

summary.span: 移除集合中的指定 執行個體。

span.span: Removes the specified instance from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在 執行個體不屬於 使用中區域的一部分時，才能將其從集合中移除。A instance can be removed from the collection only if it is not part of the active region of the . 如果 `force` 參數為 `true`，而且無法立即移除延伸區，就會擲回例外狀況。If the `force` parameter is `true` and the extent cannot be removed immediately, an exception is thrown. 如果 `force` 參數為 `false`，而且無法立即移除延伸區，該移除作業會延後，直到該延伸區不再屬於使用中區域的一部分為止。If the `force` parameter is `false` and the extent cannot be removed immediately, the removal is deferred until it is no longer part of the active region. 中的最後一個延伸區無法移除，意指 屬性在新增延伸區之後不可以為零。You cannot remove the last extent in the , which means that the property cannot be zero once an extent has been added.

exception.span: 無法移除 。

span.span: cannot be removed.

exception.span: 該延伸區仍是使用中區域的一部分，或是存取遭拒。

span.span: It is either still part of the active region, or access is denied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在 執行個體不屬於 使用中區域的一部分時，才能將其從集合中移除。A instance can be removed from the collection only if it is not part of the active region of the . 如果 `force` 參數為 `true`，而且無法立即移除延伸區，就會擲回例外狀況。If the `force` parameter is `true` and the extent cannot be removed immediately, an exception is thrown. 如果 `force` 參數為 `false`，而且無法立即移除延伸區，該移除作業會延後，直到該延伸區不再屬於使用中區域的一部分為止。If the `force` parameter is `false` and the extent cannot be removed immediately, the removal is deferred until it is no longer part of the active region. 中的最後一個延伸區無法移除，意指 屬性在新增延伸區之後不可以為零。You cannot remove the last extent in the , which means that the property cannot be zero once an extent has been added.
